data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of HaDarom, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of HaDarom, Israel
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in HaDarom, Israel. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, let it be said of the 1,138,647 lost in HaDarom that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of HaDarom to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Yudi, Tripolita'it people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of HaDarom.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of HaDarom to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of HaDarom, Israel will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

location.name: HaDarom
location.cities_list: Ashdod, Ashkelon, Kiryat Gat, Netivot, Sederot
location.cities_list_w_pop: Ashdod (224,656), Ashkelon (144,073), Kiryat Gat (57,105), Netivot (37,542), Sederot (27,635)
